channel.title: Intro to VMware Tanzu Kubernetes Operations – Tanzu Kubernetes Operations Overview
channel.description: Recent content in Tanzu Kubernetes Operations Overview on Intro to VMware Tanzu Kubernetes Operations

item.title: Docs: What is Tanzu Kubernetes Operations (TKO)
item.description:
What is Tanzu for Kubernetes Operations, or “TKO”

Tanzu for Kubernetes Operations includes a set of products and services specifically targeted to meet the needs of on-prem and cloud infrastructure teams.

TKO addresses: Developer self-service to the right infrastructure abstraction and app building blocks Automation and monitoring of cloud platform operations Enforcement of Networking, security and compliance requirements Platform operation cost optimization

TKO Includes:
Tanzu Standard Runtime (TKG)
Tanzu Mission Control (TMC)
Tanzu Observability (TO)
Tanzu Service Mesh Advanced (TSM)
Antrea
Avi Enterprise
